100% pure Java Libary
The driver can be used in the Java SDK Environment
Platform Independent

getS7String(int) - Method in class PLCCom.ReadResult
Returns a string value from the spec. position with spec. length
An S7 string includes maximum length and current length in the first two bytes
If the specified length greater than buffer.length, the the specified length will be reduced to buffer.length
getS7String() - Method in class PLCCom.ReadResult
